sourcesContent:
<template>
  <form @submit.prevent="addTodo()">
        <v-container class="input" max-width="200px">
          <v-text-field class="pa-15"
            v-model="newTodo"
            label="Crie uma nova tarefa"
            placeholder="Nova Tarefa"
            outlined
            background-color="black"
          ></v-text-field>
        </v-container> 
    <v-btn class="mx-3" rounded dark color="success" @click="addTodo"> Adicionar</v-btn>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      newTodo: ""
    };
  },
  methods: {
    addTodo() {
      if (this.newTodo.length > 0) {
        this.$emit("on-new-todo", this.newTodo);
      }
      this.newTodo = "";
    }
  }
};
</script>


<style lang="scss">
input{
      width: 30px;
      align-items: center;
}
</style>
